text:
The Apache 2.0 module list shows links for documentation for mod_auth_ldap 
(http://httpd.apache.org/docs-2.0/mod/mod_auth_ldap.html) and mod_ldap 
(http://httpd.apache.org/docs-2.0/mod/mod_ldap.html).  Both links return 404s.

I was able to find some documentation (of unknown correctness) on Covalent's 
documentation server (http://gump.covalent.net/manual/mod/mod_auth_ldap.html 
and http://gump.covalent.net/manual/mod/mod_ldap.html).
creator: corey.cole@honeywell.com
slive@apache.org
text:
Sorry, but sitemap.html is wrong (and I just changed it).  The modules are not
distributed with the
Apache HTTP server.  The only documentation for them is in the CVS repository:
http://cvs.apache.org/viewcvs.cgi/httpd-ldap/
but there ain't much of it.

Alternatively, you can see old versions of the docs in the CVS attic:
http://cvs.apache.org/viewcvs.cgi/httpd-2.0/docs/manual/mod/Attic/
but there is absolutely no gurantee that these are in any way accurate.
